reviews.text: Lovely hotel with parking right below big rooms. Very clean. Friendly front desk. Hotel provides a very nice fan for this warmer days. Big size bathrooms. Lovely breakfast

This hotel was fantastic. We had one of the best hotel experiences we ever had here.

Our room had an amazing mountain view, and it was super clean and comfortable. The breakfast was delicious, and the service was excellent.

Furthermore, we took advantage of the hotel’s guided tour. Our guide, Jens, was not only knowledgeable but also highly entertaining. He introduced us to the hidden gems of Vaduz that we would have otherwise missed.

In summary, we absolutely recommend this charming hotel, and we’re already looking forward to our return visit.
Great hotel. Staff is friendly and very helpful. Highly recommend

Just wow. Especially breakfast. You have to see it to believe it. Variety and quality is really top.
It’s still a four star hotel, so some slight hint of unfriendliness in the restaurant during dinner is forgivable. Dinner was great. Not the salat though. For 17 chf I’d expect three times more on the plate. The rest was very fresh, Rösti great. Would certainly recommend this place to a friend. Room was squeaky clean. Very quiet, what I appreciated a lot.
Solid 5 star from me. ❤️
Great hotel excellent location. Staff 10 out of 10.  Would recommend.
